metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39519 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libjpeg through 2020021. A NULL pointer dereference exists in the function BlockBitmapRequester::PullQData() located in blockbitmaprequester.cpp It allows an attacker to cause Denial of Service.

notes.Note: jdstrand> libjpeg-turbo is a fork of libjpeg8 mdeslaur> file doesn't exist in libjpeg-turbo

criterions.comment: libjpeg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0~git20210129.91985dc-1build1').
libjpeg6b package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
libjpeg9 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
